evidence.claim: xStratum.ai uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company mentions FHIR APIs in their developer documentation.
xStratum.ai is compliant with HIPAA standards for health data management.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated by xStratum.ai's APIs.
They utilize Snowflake for data management and analytics.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse functionality found.
